Trigger.name: Got Hit
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == "Horsemanship" or matches[3] == "Tattoos" or matches[3] == "Antiquated" or matches[3] == "Relic" or matches[3] == "Artifact" or matches[3] == "Racial" or matches[3] == "Research" or matches[3] == "Race" then return end if string.find(matches[1], "Warhounds Deliver") then return end if string.find(matches[1], "Numerology Sublimation") then return end if rime.cure_set == "group" then return end
local found_set = "none" for set in pairs(rime.cureset_skills) do local skill = matches[3] --skillset if table.contains(rime.cureset_skills[set], skill) then found_set = set break end end
if rime.class_hitting == "none" then --first time being hit recently if found_set == "none" then rime.echo("HEY THIS NEEDS FIXED SOMETHING HAS CHANGED! CHECK CURESET_SKILLS"..matches[1]) rime.cure_set = "default" --swap to class cureset act("dodge melee") elseif rime.cure_set ~= found_set then if rime.curing.priority[found_set] == nil then rime.echo("QUIT BEING LAZY AND MAKE A PRIORITY FOR ".. string.upper(found_set)) rime.cure_set = "default" --swap to class cureset else rime.echo("Swapping to " .. found_set .. " priority.") rime.cure_set = found_set --swap to class cureset end rime.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting end elseif rime.class_hitting ~= found_set then --this is a second class hitting rime.echo("Swapping to group priority.") rime.class_hitting = found_set rime.cure_set = "group" -- group cureset engaged end
--GUI.topRight_update()

regexCodeList.string: You touch the tree of life tattoo.

Trigger.name: Resets
Trigger.script:
local treeAffs = table.copy(rime.afflictions)
if rime.has_aff("right_arm_damaged") then treeAffs["right_arm_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("left_arm_damaged") then treeAffs["left_arm_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("right_leg_damaged") then treeAffs["right_leg_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("left_leg_damaged") then treeAffs["left_leg_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("hypothermia") then treeAffs["shivering"] = false end
for k,v in pairs(rime.curing.affsByType.tree) do if treeAffs[v] and rime.has_aff(v) then rime.silent_remAff(v) end rime.hidden_afflictions[v] = false end

Trigger.name: Resets
Trigger.script:
local renewAffs = table.copy(rime.afflictions)
if rime.has_aff("right_arm_damaged") then renewAffs["right_arm_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("left_arm_damaged") then renewAffs["left_arm_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("right_leg_damaged") then renewAffs["right_leg_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("left_leg_damaged") then renewAffs["left_leg_broken"] = false end if rime.has_aff("hypothermia") then renewAffs["shivering"] = false end
for _,v in pairs(rime.curing.affsByType.renew) do if renewAffs[v] and rime.has_aff(v) then rime.silent_remAff(v) end rime.hidden_afflictions[v] = false end

regexCodeList.string: Your pipe is now empty.

regexCodeList.string: ^You take a long drag off your pipe filled with (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Reset
Trigger.script: for k,v in pairs(rime.curing.affsByCure[lastSmoked]) do rime.silent_remAff(v) rime.remove_possible_aff(v, "no_echo") end lastSmoked = nil

regexCodeList.string: Your pipe is now empty.
^You fill your pipe with \w+ (\w+) \w+.

Trigger.name: Pipelist Start
Trigger.script:
for k,v in pairs(rime.curing.pipes) do rime.curing.pipes[k] = false end
rime.curing.pipes.last = "nothing"

Trigger.name: Pipelist
Trigger.script: for k,v in pairs(rime.curing.pipes) do if string.find(matches[3], k) then if rime.curing.pipes[k] then rime.echo("Good job you've got two of the same fucking pipe filled.") if not pipesToBeFixed then pipesToBeFixed = {} end pipesToBeFixed[#pipesToBeFixed+1] = matches[2] end rime.curing.pipes[k] = true rime.saved[k.."_pipe"] = matches[2] end if rime.saved[k.."_pipe"] == nil and rime.curing.pipes[k] == true then rime.saved[k.."_pipe"] = matches[2] table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/rime.saved.lua", rime.saved) end end

Trigger.name: End
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Pipelist Start", 0) if pipesToBeFixed then for k, v in pairs(pipesToBeFixed) do act("empty " .. v) end for k, v in pairs(rime.curing.pipes) do local que = {} if v == false and v ~= "last" then table.insert(que, "outc " .. k) if rime.saved[k .. "_pipe"] == nil then table.insert(que, "put " .. k .. " in emptypipe") table.insert(que, "pipelist") else table.insert(que, "put " .. k .. " in " .. rime.saved[k .. "_pipe"]) end end act(table.concat(que, rime.saved.separator)) end end pipesToBeFixed = nil

Trigger.script: local limbs = "broken_"..matches[2] if matches[2] == "legs" then if rime.has_aff("broken_legs") then rime.add_aff("left_leg_broken") rime.add_aff("right_leg_broken") rime.silent_remAff("broken_legs") elseif rime.has_aff("left_leg_broken") then rime.add_aff("right_leg_broken") elseif rime.has_aff("right_leg_broken") then rime.add_aff("left_leg_broken") else rime.add_aff("broken_legs") end elseif matches[2] == "arms" then if rime.has_aff("broken_arms") then rime.add_aff("left_arm_broken") rime.add_aff("right_arm_broken") rime.silent_remAff("broken_arm") elseif rime.has_aff("left_arm_broken") then rime.add_aff("right_arm_broken") elseif rime.has_aff("right_arm_broken") then rime.add_aff("left_arm_broken") else rime.add_aff("broken_arms") end end

Trigger.name: Parry
Trigger.script:
local limb_hit = matches[3] limb_hit = limb_hit:gsub(" ", "_") rime.targets[matches[2]].parry = limb_hit if rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage ~= nil and gmcp.Char.Status.class ~= "Shapeshifter" then local limb = rime.pvp.lastLimb_hit local amount = rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage local target = matches[2] rime.pvp.remove_limb(limb, amount, target) rime.pvp.remove_aff(rime.pvp.last_affliction, target) if limb == "torso" and gutcheckHit == true then gutcheckHit = false end end rime.targets[matches[2]].parry = limb_hit
if matches[2] == rime.target then selectString(matches[1], 1) fg( "orange_red" ) bg( "black" ) resetFormat() end

Trigger.name: Epidermal
Trigger.script:
local target = string.title(matches[2]) if matches[2] == rime.target then targetLastApplied = "epidermal" end rime.time("poultice", target)
rime.pvp.remove_aff("slickness", matches[2])
if matches[3] == "torso" then if rime.targets[target].afflictions.anorexia then rime.pvp.remove_aff("anorexia", target) end elseif matches[3] == "head" then if rime.targets[target].afflictions.indifference then rime.pvp.remove_aff("indifference", target) elseif rime.pvp.has_aff("stuttering", target) then rime.pvp.remove_aff("stuttering", target) elseif rime.pvp.has_aff("blurry_vision", target) then rime.pvp.remove_aff("blurry_vision", target) elseif rime.pvp.has_def("blind", target) then rime.pvp.noDef("blind", target) rime.pvp.add_aff("no_blind", target) --elseif rime.pvp.has_aff("gloom", target) then --limitStart("gloom_cure", 1.2) end elseif matches[3] == "skin" then if rime.targets[target].afflictions.indifference then rime.pvp.remove_aff("indifference", target) elseif rime.pvp.has_aff("stuttering", target) then rime.pvp.remove_aff("stuttering", target) elseif rime.pvp.has_aff("blurry_vision", target) then rime.pvp.remove_aff("blurry_vision", target) elseif rime.pvp.has_aff("anorexia", target) then rime.pvp.remove_aff("anorexia", target) elseif rime.pvp.has_def("blind", target) then rime.pvp.noDef("blind", target) rime.pvp.add_aff("no_blind", target) end end

Trigger.name: Restoration Limb
Trigger.script:
local targ = matches[2] local limb = matches[3] local limb_echo = { ["left_leg"] = "LEFT LEG", ["right_leg"] = "RIGHT LEG", ["right_arm"] = "RIGHT ARM", ["left_arm"] = "LEFT ARM", ["head"] = "HEAD", ["torso"] = "TORSO", }
rime.pvp.remove_aff("slickness", matches[2]) limb = limb:gsub(" ", "_") if targ == rime.target then targetLastApplied = "restoration" prerestoredLimb = matches[3] rime.echo("THEY APPLIED TO <red>" .. limb_echo[limb] .. "<white>!!!!!!!") end if limb == "torso" and rime.pvp.has_aff("crushed_chest", targ) and not rime.pvp.has_aff("torso_damaged", targ) then rime.pvp.remove_aff("crushed_chest", targ) else rime.pvp.restoration_cure(limb, targ) end if rime.pvp.ai then rime.pvp.offense() end

Trigger.name: Web Target
Trigger.script: if rime.illusion then return end if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end targetCalled = true rime.pvp.web_target(matches[2], matches[3]:lower():title()) targetCalled = false

Trigger.name: Omni Combat Message
Trigger.script: --Person uses Skillset Skill on Target. if rime.illusion then return end rime.last_hit = "nothing" rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage = "nothing" rime.pvp.last_affliction = "nothing" if matches[5]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end if matches[2]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end --if matches[5] == "you" then cecho("<red>CHECK THIS IN REVIEW") end if not table.contains(rime.attacks[matches[3]], matches[4]) then rime.echo("Not tracking <red>"..matches[3].." <grey>"..matches[4].."<white> in Omni1 mode yet.") rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[4].."]("..matches[5]..")") else if matches[2] == "You" then rime.attacks.personal = true else rime.attacks.personal = false end rime.attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]](matches[5]) end

Trigger.name: Omni 2 (No Target)
Trigger.script: --Person uses Skillset Skill. if rime.illusion then return end rime.last_hit = "nothing" rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage = "nothing" rime.pvp.last_affliction = "nothing" if matches[2]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end if not table.contains(rime.attacks[matches[3]], matches[4]) then rime.echo("Not tracking <red>"..matches[3].." <grey>"..matches[4].."<white> in Omni2 mode yet.") rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[4].."]("..matches[2]..")") else if matches[2] == "You" then rime.attacks.personal = true else rime.attacks.personal = false end rime.attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]](matches[2]) end

Trigger.name: Omni 3
Trigger.script: --Person uses Skillset Skill (modifier) on Target. if rime.illusion then return end rime.last_hit = "nothing" rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage = "nothing" rime.pvp.last_affliction = "nothing" if matches[2]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end if matches[6]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end local arg = matches[5] --if matches[6] == "you" then cecho("<red>CHECK THIS IN REVIEW") end arg = arg:gsub(" ", "_") if not table.contains(rime.attacks[matches[3]], matches[4]) then rime.echo("Not tracking <red>" .. matches[3] .. " <grey>" .. matches[4] .. "<white> in Omni3 mode yet.") rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[4].."]("..matches[6]..", "..arg..")") else if matches[2] == "You" then rime.attacks.personal = true else rime.attacks.personal = false end rime.attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]](matches[6], arg) end

Trigger.name: Omni 4 (Shit like Shadowprice??)
Trigger.script: --Person uses Skillset Skill Modifier on Target. if rime.illusion then return end rime.last_hit = "nothing" rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage = "nothing" rime.pvp.last_affliction = "nothing" if matches[2]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end if matches[6]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end --if matches[6] == "you" then cecho("<red>CHECK THIS IN REVIEW") end if not table.contains(rime.attacks[matches[3]], matches[4]) then rime.echo("Not tracking <red>"..matches[3].." <grey>"..matches[4].."<white> in Omni4 mode yet.") if matches[4] == "Shadowprice" then rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[4].."]["..matches[5].."]("..matches[6]..")") elseif matches[4] == "Boosted" or matches[5] == "Boosted" then rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[5].."]["..matches[4].."]("..matches[6]..")") elseif matches[3] == "Antiquated" then rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[4].."]["..matches[5].."]("..matches[6]..")") else rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[5].."]["..matches[4].."]("..matches[6]..")") end else if matches[2] == "You" then rime.attacks.personal = true else rime.attacks.personal = false end if matches[4] == "Shadowprice" then rime.attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]][matches[5]](matches[6]) elseif matches[4] == "Boosted" or matches[5] == "Boosted" then rime.attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]][matches[4]](matches[6]) elseif matches[3] == "Antiquated" then rime.attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]][matches[5]](matches[6]) end end

Trigger.name: Omni 5 (No Target + Modifier)
Trigger.script: --Person uses Skillset Skill (modifier). if rime.illusion then return end rime.last_hit = "nothing" rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage = "nothing" rime.pvp.last_affliction = "nothing" if matches[2]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = true end if not table.contains(rime.attacks[matches[3]], matches[4]) then rime.echo("Not tracking <red>"..matches[3].." <grey>"..matches[4].."<white> in Omni5 mode yet.") rime.echo("rime.attacks["..matches[3].."]["..matches[4].."]("..matches[2]..", "..matches[5]..")") else if matches[2] == "You" then rime.attacks.personal = true else rime.attacks.personal = false end rime.attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]](matches[2], matches[5]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\): \w+ says, "Call your affs\."$
^\(Web\): \w+ says, "Affliction count, health status\."$

Trigger.name: Status Response
Trigger.script:
local person, affCount, healthPercent = matches[2], tonumber(matches[3]), tonumber(matches[4])
healthPercent = math.floor((healthPercent+5)/10)*10 healthPercent = (100-healthPercent)/10 if healthPercent < 0 then healthPercent = 0 end health_to_aggro = { [0] = 0,1,2,5,7,9,15,15,18,20,30} rime.targets[person].aggro = (affCount*2)+health_to_aggro[healthPercent] rime.echo(person.."'s aggro is now "..rime.targets[person].aggro)

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, \"Afflictions\: (\d+) Health\: (\d+)\.\"$

Trigger.name: proned
Trigger.script: rime.pvp.add_aff("prone", matches[2]) if matches[2] == rime.target then selectString(matches[1], 1) fg("red") bg("slate_grey") resetFormat() end

Trigger.name: My Venom
Trigger.script: if not rime.targets[rime.last_hit].defences.rebounding or rime.pvp.ignore_rebounding then rime.pvp.add_aff(matches[2], rime.last_hit) end

Trigger.name: Claustro/Agora
Trigger.script:
if not rime.pvp.has_aff("agoraphobia", matches[2]) then rime.pvp.add_aff("agoraphobia", matches[2]) if rime.targets[matches[2]].stacks.gloom > 0 then rime.pvp.remove_stack("gravity", matches[2]) end end
if not rime.pvp.has_aff("claustrophobia", matches[2]) then rime.pvp.add_aff("claustrophobia", matches[2]) if rime.targets[matches[2]].stacks.gloom > 0 then rime.pvp.remove_stack("gravity", matches[2]) end end
rime.pvp.add_aff("blackout", matches[2])

Trigger.name: Broken Legs prone
Trigger.script: if rime.pvp.has_aff("left_leg_broken", matches[2]) and rime.pvp.has_aff("right_leg_broken", matches[2]) then rime.pvp.add_aff("prone", matches[2]) end if rime.pvp.has_aff("left_leg_broken", matches[2]) and rime.pvp.has_aff("right_leg_numbed", matches[2]) then rime.pvp.add_aff("prone", matches[2]) end if rime.pvp.has_aff("right_leg_broken", matches[2]) and rime.pvp.has_aff("left_leg_numbed", matches[2]) then rime.pvp.add_aff("prone", matches[2]) end

Trigger.name: Rebounding Hit
Trigger.script: rime.targets[rime.last_hit].defences.rebounding = true if rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage ~= nil and gmcp.Char.Status.class ~= "Shapeshifter" then local limb = rime.pvp.lastLimb_hit local amount = rime.pvp.lastLimb_damage local target = rime.last_hit if limb == "torso" and gutcheckHit == true then gutcheckHit = false end rime.pvp.remove_limb(limb, amount, target) if rime.pvp.last_affliction ~= "nothing" then rime.pvp.remove_aff(rime.pvp.last_affliction, rime.last_hit) end end

Trigger.name: Sparring Room
Trigger.script: if rime.illusion then return end rime.echo("Hidden aff total: "..rime.hidden_affs_total) rime.reset() if rime.pvp.ai then rime.pvp.ai = false rime.echo("Offense killed.", "pvp") end local sparringAffReadout = {} for k,v in pairs(rime.afflictions) do if v then table.insert(sparringAffReadout, k) end end rime.echo(table.concat(sparringAffReadout, ", "), "pvp") act("reject grace")

Trigger.name: Contemplate

Trigger.name: Seize Used
Trigger.script:
prae.can_seize = false local target = matches[2] local mAffs = rime.pvp.mental_count(target) local mAffBump = 4.00 local seizeMana = tonumber((10.98) + (mAffs*mAffBump)) if rime.pvp.has_aff("blood_curse", target) then seizeMana = seizeMana+((seizeMana/10)*1.5) end
rime.targets[target].mana = rime.targets[target].mana-seizeMana rime.echo("Target's mana is at "..rime.targets[target].mana) if rime.pvp.ai then rime.pvp.offense() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You use Sanguis Seize on (\w+)\.$

EXITS SHAKEN BLOCK SOMEWHERE NEW!
") rime.blockChange = true send("ql") --tempTimer(.2, [[for k, v in pairs(gmcp.Room.Info.exits) do if v == blockExit then act("block "..k..rime.saved.separator.."wt NEW BLOCK IS "..k) end end]])

Trigger.name: Blocked
Trigger.script: local temp = { --k = v n = "north", e = "east", s = "south", w = "west", ne = "northeast", se = "southeast", sw = "southwest", nw = "northwest", u = "up", d = "down", i = "in", o = "out", ["in"] = "in", ["out"] = "out" } blockExit = "" for k,v in pairs(temp) do --echo("\nk is "..k..", and v is "..v) if matches[2] == v then blockExit = gmcp.Room.Info.exits[k] end end --echo("\n"..blockExit)

regexCodeList.string: ^You move over to block the (\w+) exit\.$

Trigger.name: Unblock
Trigger.script: if blockExit ~= nil then for k, v in pairs(gmcp.Room.Info.exits) do if v == blockExit then act("block "..k) break end end end

regexCodeList.string: You have been afflicted with a hidden affliction!

Belmith Scornhead sweeps his hands in a dramatic gesture, an action that elicits a throbbing feeling of agony in your legs as the flesh therein bubbles and blackens, the sinew and muscle fizzling away before your very eyes. In only a flickering moment you no longer maintain the muscle necessary to hold your weight, and the bones snap gruesomely in half.

A low buzz resonates from the back of Belmith Scornhead's throat as he tilts his head back and belches forth a swarm of ravenous insects that coalesce into place along your arms. It takes only moments for these bugs to eat their way through your skin and onto the bones beneath, which they then make prompt work of devouring chunks of as well.
With an expression of cold neutrality, Tellimerius, the Deep Dweller whirls her twin scimitars in the air as she draws closer to you, burying one into each of your shoulders.

"..matches[1]) --echo(matches[2].."
") --echo(matches[3].."
") --display(t) if table.size(t) == 1 then local k, v = next(t) cecho( "<orange_red> " .. mmp.cleanAreaName(mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(type(k) == "number" and k or v)] or "?") ) else local k, v = next(t) local areas = {} if type(k) == "number" then for k, _ in pairs(t) do areas[mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(k)] or "?"] = true end else for _, k in pairs(t) do areas[mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(k)] or "?"] = true end end local flattened_areas = {} for k, _ in pairs(areas) do if k ~= "" then flattened_areas[#flattened_areas + 1] = mmp.cleanAreaName(k) end end cecho( "<orange_red> " .. table.concat(flattened_areas, ", or ") ) end

Trigger.name: Starburst
Trigger.script: if swarm.targeting.who == matches[2] then swarm.targeting.burst = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) uses Illumination Rebirth\.$
^(\w+) uses Tattoos Starburst\.$
^(\w+) uses Purification Resurgence\.$
^(\w+) uses Ancestry Intervention\.$

Trigger.name: prompt
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("Death In Room", 0)
if swarm.targeting.auto and not swarm.targeting.burst then table.remove(swarm.room, table.index_of(swarm.room, swarm.targeting.who)) if swarm.targeting.who == rime.target then expandAlias("nt") end end
swarm.targeting.who = nil swarm.targeting.burst = false

Trigger.name: Target not in room
Trigger.script:
if matches[2]:title() == rime.target then rime.pvp.targetThere = false end if not swarm.targeting.auto then return end
local who = matches[2]:title()
if table.contains(swarm.targeting.list, who) and who == rime.target:title() then expandAlias("nt") end
rime.pvp.aggro(who, "reset")

regexCodeList.string: ^You can find no such target as '(\w+)'\.$

Trigger.name: Auto Target List
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local list = matches[3]
if table.contains(rime.pvp.boss, caller) then swarm.targeting.list = {} swarm.addTargetList(list) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target list\: (.+)\."$

Trigger.name: Caller Target Priority
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local tar = matches[3] local pos = matches[4] or nil
if table.contains(rime.pvp.boss, caller) then swarm.addSingleTarget(tar, pos) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target priority\: (\w+) (\d+)\."$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target priority\: (\w+)\."$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "(\w+) priority\: (\d+)\."$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target priority\: (\w+) (\d+)\."$

Trigger.name: Caller Remove Target
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local who = matches[3]
if table.contains(rime.pvp.boss, caller) then swarm.removeTarget(who) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target removed\: (\w+)."$

Trigger.name: Target blocked by wall or not adjacent
Trigger.script:
if not swarm.targeting.auto then return end
local who = rime.target:title()
if table.contains(swarm.targeting.list, who) then expandAlias("nt") end

regexCodeList.string: A massive wall blocks your dagger.
You don't see any such player in an adjacent location.

Trigger.name: Target has aegis
Trigger.script:
if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Carnifex" then act("soul erode " .. matches[2]) return end
local who = matches[2]:title() local count = 1
if table.contains(swarm.targeting.list, who) then local pos = table.index_of(swarm.targeting.list, who) or nil for k, v in ipairs(swarm.targeting.list) do if table.contains(swarm.room, who) and table.contains(swarm.room, v) and k > table.index_of(swarm.targeting.list, who) then expandAlias("t " .. v) --! NOTE: This must match your system's targeting alias break end end else table.remove(swarm.room, table.index_of(swarm.room, who)) expandAlias("nt") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your attack is repelled by the magical aegis protecting (\w+)\.$
You detect the following presences:
^(\w+) is here\.$

Trigger.name: Party Emoji
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == "pensive" then selectString(":pensive:.", 1) replace("😔 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "flushed" then selectString(":flushed:.", 1) replace("😳 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "relieved" then selectString(":relieved:.", 1) replace("😌 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "eggplant" then selectString(":eggplant:.", 1) replace("🍆 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "frown" then selectString(":frown:.", 1) replace("🙁 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "weary" then selectString(":weary:.", 1) replace("😩 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "smirk" then selectString(":smirk:.", 1) replace("😏 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "wink" then selectString(":wink:.", 1) replace("😉 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "rage" then selectString(":rage:.", 1) replace("😡 ") deselect() elseif matches[2] == "open_mouth" then selectString(":open_mouth:.", 1) replace("😮 ") deselect() end

Trigger.name: CWHO
Trigger.script: cityMembers = {} ndbCity = matches[2] if ndbCity ~= "Bloodloch" then setTriggerStayOpen("CWHO", 0) return end

regexCodeList.string: ^The following citizens of (\w+) are in the realm:$

Trigger.name: Person Found
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "Citizen" or matches[2] == "The" or matches[2] == "Abhorash" then
else local person = string.trim(matches[2]) local rank = "" sndNDB_Acquire(person)
rank = string.trim(matches[3].." of "..matches[4])
if string.find(line, "Novice") or string.find(line, "novice") then rank = "(N)"..matches[3] end if string.find(rank, "Undead") then rank = "Advocate of the Undead" end local etc = string.trim(matches[5]) if not sndNDB_Exists(person) or not sndNDB_isCitizenOf(ndbCity, person) then table.insert(cityMembers, person) else deleteLine() local guild = sndNDB_getGuild(person) echo("\n"..person..string.rep(" ", 15-string.len(person))..rank) echo(string.rep(" ", 25-string.len(rank))..guild) if etc then echo(string.rep(" ", 15-string.len(guild))..etc) end end end

Trigger.name: Close CWHO
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("CWHO", 0)
if next(cityMembers) then rime.echo("Need an update due to: "..table.concat(cityMembers, ", ")..".") sndNDB_NameList(cityMembers) end

regexCodeList.string: Citizen Rank Position [CT?]
You take a drink of an elixir of health
You take a drink of an elixir of mana

return gmcp.Room.Info.num > 0

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room.Info.num > 2121028
return gmcp.Room.Info.coords==""

Trigger.script: if zgui.map.current ~= "Ocean" then zgui.map[zgui.map.current]:hide() end zgui.map.current = "Ocean" zgui.map["Ocean"]:show()

return gmcp.Room.Info.num==-2

Trigger.name: Hit
Trigger.script: if not rime.pvp.whirlwind_order_set then if not table.contains(rime.pvp.beyblade_order, matches[2]) then table.insert(rime.pvp.beyblade_order, matches[2]) end rime.pvp.whirlwind_affs_called = false end

^\w+ strikes out at (\w+) with .+\, ripping \w+ wide open\.$

Trigger.name: Whirlwind Hit
Trigger.script: rime.pvp.whirlwind_affs_called = false rime.last_hit = matches[2] rime.pvp.ignore_rebounding = true

regexCodeList.string: ^You strike out at (\w+)\, slashing \w+ with .+\.$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, \"Whirlwind venoms(.+)\.\"$

Timer.name: Target Focus
Timer.script:
local player = rime.target
if rime.targets[player] and rime.targets[player].cooldowns.focus then if rime.targets[player].time.focus then rime.checkTime("focus", player) end end

Timer.name: blackout_check
Timer.script: if rime.has_aff("blackout") then act("concentrate") act("recoup") act("compose") act("stand") act("smoke vial") act("hp"..rime.saved.separator.."mp") local free_checks = {} local sep = rime.saved.separator table.insert(free_checks, "eat vial") if not (rime.balances.balance or rime.balances.equilibrium) then local exit = "" for k, v in pairs(gmcp.Room.Info.exits) do exit = k break end table.insert(free_checks, "dash " .. exit) end if rime.balances.equilibrium then table.insert(free_checks, "meditate") end table.insert(free_checks, "enemy " .. rime.target) table.insert(free_checks, "smoke vial") act(table.concat(free_checks, sep)) else disableTimer("blackout_check") end

Timer.name: recklessness_check
Timer.script: if rime.has_aff("recklessness") then act("HP","MP") else disableTimer("recklessness_check") end

Timer.name: Effusion Backup Plan
Timer.script: if rime.has_aff("effused_blood") then act("queue poultice apply epidermal to torso") else disableTimer("Effusion Backup Plan") end

Timer.name: Pulse
Timer.script: if not system_loaded then return end rime.cure_all() if rime.pvp.ai then rime.pvp.offense() end

Timer.name: whirlwind_timer
Timer.script:
local conversion = { ["asthma"] = "kalmia", ["slickness"] = "gecko", ["anorexia"] = "slike", ["stupidity"] = "aconite", ["paresis"] = "curare", ["sensitivity"] = "prefarar", } local order = rime.pvp.beyblade_order local affs = {"asthma", "slickness", "anorexia", "stupidity", "paresis", "sensitivity"} local hasAff = rime.pvp.has_aff local venoms = {} for i = #order, 1, -1 do local tar = order[i] for k,v in ipairs(affs) do if not hasAff(v, tar) then table.insert(venoms, conversion[v]) break end end end
act("wipe bardiche")
for k,v in ipairs(venoms) do act("envenom bardiche with "..v) end if not rime.pvp.whirlwind_affs_called then act("wt whirlwind venoms: "..table.concat(venoms, ", ")) rime.pvp.whirlwind_affs_called = true end

Alias.name: Help!
Alias.script: rime_help(matches[2])

Alias.name: Artifact Support
Alias.script: rime.artifact_toggle(matches[2], matches[3])

Alias.name: Set Separator
Alias.script: send("config separator "..matches[2]) if not rime.saved then rime.saved = {} end rime.saved.separator = matches[2] table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/rime.saved.lua", rime.saved) rime.echo("You have changed your separator to <red>"..matches[2].."<white>. Rime will now always use that to try to separate your commands.")

Alias.script: if not rime.saved then rime.saved = {} end rime.saved.mount = matches[2] table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/rime.saved.lua", rime.saved) rime.echo("You have changed your mount # to <red>"..matches[2].."<white>. Rime will always use this as the default mount to recall and mount.")

Alias.name: Set Stable
Alias.script: if not rime.saved then rime.saved = {} end rime.saved.stable = matches[2] table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/rime.saved.lua", rime.saved) rime.echo("You have changed your stable to <red>"..matches[2].."<white>. Rime will always use this as the default stable to return your mount to.")

Alias.name: System Save
Alias.script: rime.echo("Saving Targets and Saved tables...") table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/rime.targets.lua", rime.targets) table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/rime.saved.lua", rime.saved) rime.echo("Saved.")

Alias.name: Gag Commands
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "yes" then rime.echo("Rime will now gag commands sent through the act() function.") rime.saved.gag_command = true elseif matches[2] == "no" then rime.echo("Rime will no longer gag commands sent through the act() function.") rime.saved.gag_command = false end

Alias.name: Pause
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "pause" then rime.paused = true rime.echo("System is paused!") elseif matches[2] == "unpause" then rime.paused = false rime.echo("System is unpaused!") end

Alias.name: Keep Up Defense
Alias.script: rime.keepdef(matches[2])

Alias.name: Defense Profile
Alias.script:
-- For defences you want to keep up in the middle of combat use the function keepdef() -- Example: rime.keepdef("cloak") -- For defences you want to put up once use unpausedef() -- Example: rime.unpausedef("deathsight") rime.defences.profileLoaded = true --this will bypass the generic defup() sequence and opt only for the defences loaded here rime.keepdef("thirdeye", "no echo") rime.keepdef("density", "no echo") rime.keepdef("mindseye", "no echo") rime.keepdef("nightsight", "no echo") rime.keepdef("fangbarrier", "no echo") rime.keepdef("insomnia", "no echo") rime.keepdef("deathsight", "no echo") rime.keepdef("speed", "no echo") rime.keepdef("temperance", "no echo") rime.keepdef("overwatch", "no echo") rime.keepdef("insight", "no echo") rime.keepdef("lifevision", "no echo") rime.keepdef("lipreading", "no echo") rime.keepdef("miasma", "no echo") rime.keepdef("dodging", "no echo") rime.keepdef("insulation", "no echo") rime.keepdef("venom_resistance", "no echo") rime.keepdef("nightsight", "no echo plz") rime.keepdef("levitation", "no echo plz") rime.keepdef("blindness", "no echo plz") rime.keepdef("deafness", "no echo plz") rime.keepdef("instawake", "no echo plz") rime.keepdef("insulation", "no echo plz") rime.keepdef("waterbreathing", "no echo plz") rime.keepdef("rebounding", "noechopls") rime.keepdef("lifesense", "noechopls") rime.keepdef("cloak", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("flame", "no echo plz") rime.unpausedef("clarity", "no echo plz") rime.unpausedef("divine_speed", "no echo plz") local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class if class == "Carnifex" then rime.keepdef("gripping", "no echo") rime.keepdef("enfrost", "no echo") rime.keepdef("soulharvest", "no echo") rime.keepdef("soulthirst", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("soul_fortify", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("fitness", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("soul_fracture", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("soulbind", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("cruelty", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("reckless", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("spiritsight", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("soul_substitute", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("herculeanrage", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("fearless", "no echo") elseif class == "Revenant" then rime.keepdef("gripping", "no echo") rime.unpausedef("maingauche", "no") rime.unpausedef("fitness", "no") rime.unpausedef("ingather", "no") rime.unpausedef("aura_concentrate", "no") rime.unpausedef("phantasm_absorb", "no") rime.unpausedef("chimera_choke", "no") rime.unpausedef("chimera_influence", "no") rime.unpausedef("chimera_congeal", "no") end
rime.echo("Defense profile loaded", "def")

Alias.name: aegis
Alias.script: rime.pvp.ai = false act() if matches[2] then if not has_def("defending") then act("qs",rime.pvp.queue_handle(),"manipulate pylon for aegis transmute") else act("qs",rime.pvp.queue_handle(),"touch worrystone") end else if not has_def("defending") then act("qs",rime.pvp.queue_handle(),"manipulate pylon for aegis") else act("qs",rime.pvp.queue_handle(),"touch worrystone") end end

Alias.name: lyre mode????
Alias.script: local sep = rime.saved.separator local pipeaction = getCureAction(nextPipeAff()) local poulticeaction = getCureAction(nextPoulticeAff()) local pillaction = getCureAction(nextPillAff()) local lyreaction = "" if pipeaction ~= "nothing" then lyreaction = pipeaction..sep end if poulticeaction ~= "nothing" then lyreaction = lyreaction..poulticeaction..sep end if pillaction ~= "nothing" then lyreaction = lyreaction..pillaction end if not has_def("insomnia") then lyreaction = "insomnia"..lyreaction end if rime.has_aff("asleep") then lyreaction = "wake"..lyreaction end if not rime.defences.general.barrier.deffed then send(rime.pvp.queue_handle()..sep..lyreaction..sep.."touch tree"..sep.."renew"..sep.."sip health"..sep.."strum lyre") else send(rime.pvp.queue_handle():gsub("qeb ","")..sep..lyreaction..sep.."touch tree"..sep.."renew"..sep.."sip health"..sep.."strum lyre") end

Alias.name: Set Hounds
Alias.script:
--set hound trait hound
rime.saved.hound_atks = rime.saved.hound_atks or {poisonclaw = "none", growl = "none", contagion = "none", stare = "none", acidspit = "none", shock = "none", tundralhowl = "none", ululate = "none", mark = "none", bite = "none", firebreath = "none"}
if matches[2] then rime.saved.hound_atks[matches[2]] = string.title(matches[3]) else rime.echo("SET HOUND <trait> <hound>") return end
rime.echo("Set <red>"..string.title(matches[3]).."<white> to use <DarkOrange>"..matches[2].."<white>.", "pvp")

Alias.name: Show Hounds
Alias.script:
local hound_display = {} local missing = {}
for k,v in pairs(rime.saved.hound_atks) do if v ~= "none" then table.insert(hound_display, "<red>"..v.."<white> is set to use <DarkOrange>"..k.."<white>.") else table.insert(missing, k) end end
cecho("
<SlateGray>Hound Settings:

"..table.concat(hound_display, "
"))
cecho("

<white>You are missing Hounds for the following skills: <DarkOrange>"..table.concat(missing, ", "))

Alias.name: Crush and Pulv
Alias.script:
local sep = rime.saved.separator local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class local pre = rime.pvp.queue_handle()..sep
if class == "Carnifex" then rime.pvp.ai = false if not rime.pvp.has_aff("prone", rime.target) then act(pre.."pole hook "..rime.target) elseif rime.pvp.has_aff("crushed_chest", rime.target) then act(pre.."hammer pulverize "..rime.target) elseif not rime.pvp.has_def("rebounding", rime.target) then act(pre.."hammer crush "..rime.target.." chest") else act(pre.."pole raze "..rime.target) end carn.handleHounds() end

Alias.name: Forging For Stats
Alias.script:
--forge <style> <weapon> <number of damage tempers> <number of penetration tempers> <number of speed tempers> <damage> <penetration> <speed> forge = {}
forge.style = matches[2] forge.wpn = matches[3]
forge.damTempers = 0 forge.damHold = tonumber(matches[4]) forge.penTempers = 0 forge.penHold = tonumber(matches[5]) forge.spdTempers = 0 forge.spdHold = tonumber(matches[6]) forge.damGoal = tonumber(matches[7]) forge.penGoal = tonumber(matches[8]) forge.spdGoal = tonumber(matches[9])
enableTrigger("Forging") send("qeb forge " ..forge.style.. " " ..forge.wpn)

Alias.name: Weapon Mass Production
Alias.script:
--forge <number of items> <style> <weapon> <number of damage tempers> <number of penetration tempers> <number of speed tempers> forge = {}
forge.complete = 0 forge.number = tonumber(matches[2]) forge.style = matches[3] forge.wpn = matches[4]
forge.damTempers = 0 forge.damHold = tonumber(matches[5]) forge.penTempers = 0 forge.penHold = tonumber(matches[6]) forge.spdTempers = 0 forge.spdHold = tonumber(matches[7])
local commsToForge = table.deepcopy(mj.forge.items[forge.wpn].commodities) local priceInCity = 0 local priceInAvg = 0 local city = "" if gmcp.Char.Status.city == "Bloodloch" then city = "blPrices" else city = "spPrices" end for comm,quantity in pairs(commsToForge) do commsToForge[comm] = commsToForge[comm]*forge.number cecho("\n<dodger_blue>It will take <a_blue>"..commsToForge[comm].." "..comm..".") priceInCity = priceInCity+mj.commodities[city][comm]*commsToForge[comm] priceInAvg = priceInAvg+mj.commodities.avgPrice[comm].price*commsToForge[comm]+.5 end cecho("\n<dodger_blue>This will cost <a_blue>"..priceInCity.." in gold from Bloodloch's commodity shop.") cecho("\n<dodger_blue>This will cost <a_blue>"..math.floor(priceInAvg).." in gold from your personal commodity stash.") enableTrigger("Mass Forging") send("qeb forge " ..forge.style.. " " ..forge.wpn)

Alias.name: Armour Mass Production
Alias.script:
--forge <number of items> <style> <armor> <number of blunt tempers> <number of cutting tempers> forge = {}
forge.complete = 0 forge.number = tonumber(matches[2]) forge.style = matches[3] forge.armr = matches[4]
forge.blntTempers = 0 forge.blntHold = tonumber(matches[5]) forge.cutTempers = 0 forge.cutHold = tonumber(matches[6])
local priceInCity = 0 local priceInAvg = 0 local city = "" if gmcp.Char.Status.city == "Bloodloch" then city = "blPrices" else city = "spPrices" end local commsToForge = table.deepcopy(mj.forge.items[forge.armr].commodities) for comm,quantity in pairs(commsToForge) do commsToForge[comm] = commsToForge[comm]*forge.number cecho("\n<dodger_blue>It will take <a_blue>"..commsToForge[comm].." "..comm..".") priceInCity = priceInCity+mj.commodities[city][comm]*commsToForge[comm] priceInAvg = priceInAvg+(math.floor(mj.commodities.avgPrice[comm].price*commsToForge[comm]+.5)) end
cecho("\n<dodger_blue>This will cost <a_blue>"..priceInCity.." in gold from your city's commodity shop.") cecho("\n<dodger_blue>This will cost <a_blue>"..priceInAvg.." in gold from your personal commodity stash.") enableTrigger("Armour Forging") send("qeb forge " ..forge.style.. " " ..forge.armr) if forge.armr == "leather" then forge.armr = "leatherarmour" end

local r = f() if r ~= nil then display(r) end

Alias.name: Mail

Alias.name: Toggle Highlighting
Alias.script: if sndNDB.highlightNames then --Remove any highlights, and turn off the toggle. sndNDB.highlightNames = false sndNDB_Unhighlight() rime.echo("Disabled name highlighting.") else --Begin highlighting again, and enable them all. sndNDB.highlightNames = true sndNDB_loadHighlights() rime.echo("Enabled name highlighting.") end

Alias.name: Set Org Colours
Alias.script:
local cities = {"Bloodloch", "Duiran", "Enemies", "Enorian", "Rogues", "Spinesreach"}
local city, colour = "", ""
if table.contains(cities, matches[2]:title()) then city = matches[2]:title() colour = matches[3] elseif table.contains(cities, matches[3]:title()) then city = matches[3]:title() colour = matches[2] else rime.echo("That is not a valid option, please choose from: <green>Bloodloch, Duiran, Enemies, Enorian, Rogues or Spinesreach") end
if city ~= "" then if table.contains(color_table, colour) then rime.echo(city.." will now be highlighted in <"..colour..">"..colour..".") if city ~= "Enemies" then sndNDB_updateHighlights(city, colour) else sndNDB_enemyHighlights() end else rime.echo("That is not a valid colour to choose from.") end end

Alias.name: Show Settings
Alias.script:
local count = 0 for i,v in pairs(sndNDB.players) do count = count + 1 end
rime.echo(" Name Database Settings") echo("
 ") rime.echo((sndNDB.highlightNames and "<green>We are" or "<red>We are not").."<NavajoWhite> currently highlighting names.") cecho("
 <NavajoWhite> Total of <white>"..count.."<NavajoWhite> names!

")
rime.echo(" Highlight settings:") for city, colour in pairs(sndNDB.highlighting) do cecho("
 <"..colour..">"..city.."<white>"..string.rep(" ", 12-string.len(city)).."citizens will be highlighted in <"..colour..">"..colour..".") end
cecho("

Alias.name: Toggle Highlighting Options For Enemies
Alias.script: local x = { i = "italics", b = "bold", u = "underline" } local opt = x[matches[2]] if not sndNDB.enemySettings[opt] then sndNDB.enemySettings[opt] = true rime.echo("Enemies <green>will now have <NavajoWhite>"..opt.." applied to it.") else sndNDB.enemySettings[opt] = false rime.echo("Enemies <red>will no longer have <NavajoWhite>"..opt.." applied to it.") end sndNDB_enemyHighlights()

Alias.name: (ZSHOW) Show Windows
Alias.script:
if matches[2] then local showThis = string.title(matches[2]) if showThis == "All" then for i=1, #zgui.modules, 1 do zgui[zgui.modules[i]]() end elseif zgui["build"..showThis] then zgui["build"..showThis]() cecho("
<purple> -Ran: zgui\.build"..showThis.."\(\) 
") else cecho("
<purple> -No <white>\["..showThis.."\]<purple> Found for zgui\.build"..showThis.."\(\) check capitalization 
") end else cecho("
<purple> --------------------------------------------------------") cecho("

") cecho("
<white> Modules Installed:") for i=1, #zgui.modules, 1 do cecho("
<purple> - <SteelBlue>"..utf8.remove(zgui.modules[i], 1, 5)) end cecho("

<purple> -To display a single window type:") cecho("

<white> zshow RoomItems") cecho("
<purple> --------------------------------------------------------
") end

Alias.name: (ZSTYLE) Style Windows

if matches[2] then local showThis = string.lower(matches[2]) local foundIt = false for k,v in pairs(zgui.styles) do if k == showThis then foundIt = true zgui.useStyle = showThis zgui.restyle() end end if not foundIt then cecho("
<purple> -No <white>\["..showThis.."\]<purple> Found 
") end else cecho("
<purple> --------------------------------------------------------") cecho("
<purple> GUI Styler
") cecho("
<purple> Styles Already Installed:") for k,v in pairs(zgui.styles) do cecho("
<white> -"..k.."<purple> = "..zgui.styles[k].."<gray>\(\)") end cecho("

<purple> -To Switch Styles Type:") cecho("
<white> zstyle greygroove") cecho("
<white> zstyle greeninset") cecho("
<purple> --------------------------------------------------------
") end

") else cecho("
<purple> -No Version of Either:
") cecho("

") cecho("

") end else cecho("
<purple> --------------------------------------------------------") cecho("

<purple> --------------------------------------------------------
") end

Script.name: System Load
Script.script:
system_loaded = system_loaded or false
function system_load()
if systemloadhandler then killAnonymousEventHandler(systemloadhandler) end local dir = getMudletHomeDir().."/RIME"
table.load(dir.."/Rime Utilities.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Core.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime GMCP.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Defences.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Curing.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Curing Priorities.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Core.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvE.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Social.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Praenomen.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Teradrim.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Carnifex.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Sciomancer.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Indorani.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Syssin.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Revenant.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Bashing Vnums.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime PvP Shapeshifter.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Mercantile.lua") table.load(dir.."/Rime Attack Library.lua") -- table.load(dir.."/Rime Setup and Help.lua") -- table.load(dir.."/Rime Order Shrines.lua")
rime.echo("Rime locked and primed.") system_loaded = true
end
systemloadhandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char", system_load, true)

Script.name: parse_skillsets
populate_skills

function populate_skills() local group = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.group local list = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.list local newlist = {} for i, val in ipairs(list) do list[i] = val:gsub("* ", "") end
if group then if not rime.skills then rime.skills = {} end rime.skills[group] = list end --GUI.topRight_update() end

Script.name: has_skill
Script.script:
function hasSkill(skill, tree) if not rime.skills then return false end
if tree then if rime.skills[tree:lower()] and table.contains(rime.skills[tree:lower()], skill) then return true else return false end else if table.contains(rime.skills, skill) then return true else return false end end end

if rime.blockChange then rime.blockChange = false for k, v in pairs(gmcp.Room.Info.exits) do if v == blockExit then act("block "..k,"wt NEW BLOCK IS ","wt block "..k) end end end
end

Script.name: movementDone
Script.script:
function movementDone ( event )
local sep = rime.saved.separator local area = gmcp.Room.Info.area
rime.pve.autowalking = false rime.pve.fish_moving = false if rime.pve.corpse_turn_in then if area == "the Three Rock Outpost" then act("give 50 buffalo to ugtar"..sep.."give 50 horse to ugtar"..sep.."in"..sep.."give 50 wildcat to ennioch") elseif area == "the Ayhesa Cliffs" then act("give 50 spellshaper to ephin"..sep.."give 50 spellshaper to ephin") elseif area == "the desert village of El'Jazira" then act("give 50 teshen to horace"..sep.."give 50 teshen to horace"..sep.."give 50 teshen to horace"..sep.."give 50 teshen to horace"..sep.."give 50 teshen to horace"..sep.."give 50 teshen to horace") elseif area == "the Forgotten Dome" then act ("give 50 kelki to hoelth"..sep.."give 50 kelki to hoelth"..sep.."give 50 kelki to hoelth") elseif area == "the Ia'shal Barrow" then act("greet guard") end end
if rime.pve.exploration.auto_exploring then rime.pve.exploration.room_count = rime.pve.exploration.room_count+1 act("survey") end
end

Script.name: addMob
removeMob
exploration_room_skip
Script.script: function exploration_room_skip(event) if rime.pve.exploration.auto_exploring then if not rime.pve.exploration.failed_rooms then rime.pve.exploration.failed_rooms = {} end table.insert(rime.pve.exploration.failed_rooms, rime.pve.exploration.area_rooms[rime.pve.exploration.room_count]) rime.pve.exploration.room_count = rime.pve.exploration.room_count + 1 act("survey") end end

ScriptGroup.name: swarm

Script.name: Auto Target Calling
Script.script:
function swarm.autoTargeting()
if not swarm.targeting.auto then return end
if #swarm.room ~= 0 and not table.contains(swarm.room, rime.target:title()) then for _, tar in ipairs(swarm.targeting.list) do if table.contains(swarm.room, tar) then rime.target_track(tar) break end end end
end
function swarm.removeTarget(tar)
local who = tar:title()
for k, v in pairs(swarm.targeting.list) do if v == who then table.remove(swarm.targeting.list, k) swarm.e.echo("Removed " .. who .. " from targeting list!", true, true) break end end
end
function swarm.addTargetList(str)
local targets = string.split(str, ", ")
for _, v in ipairs(targets) do if table.contains(swarm.targeting.list, v) then else v = v:title() table.insert(swarm.targeting.list, v) end end
swarm.displayTargetList()
end
function swarm.addSingleTarget(tar, pos)
if not pos then pos = 1 end
tar = tar:title()
if table.contains(swarm.targeting.list, tar) then --! just tidying so we don't end up with the same name in a bunch of places for k, v in pairs(swarm.targeting.list) do if v == tar then table.remove(swarm.targeting.list, k) break end end end table.insert(swarm.targeting.list, pos, tar)
swarm.displayTargetList()
end
function swarm.displayTargetList()
local string = "Targeting order is "
if #swarm.targeting.list == 0 then string = "Targeting list is empty!" else for k,v in ipairs(swarm.targeting.list) do if k < #swarm.targeting.list then string = string .. v .. ", " elseif #swarm.targeting.list == 1 then string = string .. v .. "." else string = string .. v .. "." end end end
swarm.e.echo(string, true, true)
end
function swarm.callTargetList()
if not rime.pvp.calling then return end --! if you want to be able to call. If not, the core functions will work regardless. local string = "Target list: "
if #swarm.targeting.list == 0 then string = "Out of targets!" else for k,v in ipairs(swarm.targeting.list) do if k < #swarm.targeting.list then string = string .. v .. ", " elseif #swarm.targeting.list == 1 then string = string .. v .. "." else string = string .. v .. "." end end end
send("wt " .. string)
end
function swarm.clearTargetList()
swarm.targeting.list = {} swarm.e.echo("Target list cleared!", true, true)
if rime.pvp.calling and swarm.targeting.auto then send("wt Target list cleared.") end
end

Script.name: swarm.parseRoom
Script.script:
function swarm.parseRoom() if not gmcp.Room then return end
local list = gmcp.Room.Players
swarm.room = {} for k, v in pairs(list) do table.insert(swarm.room, list[k].name) end end

Script.name: R A I N B O W S
Script.script:
-- Take in a string to rainbow-ify, optionally rainbow type and frequency for type 1 -- str : string to rainbow-ify -- type : type of rainbow-ification -- 0 - single cycle of colours, default option -- 1 - multiple cycles determined by frequency, possible less than a full cycle -- 2 - Old, ugly, technically rainbowed thing -- freq : color frequency of rainbow in degrees, 0 to 360, default 15 -- higher freqs produce much shorter cycles of color, lower freqs longer cycles -- freq of 1 is solid color -- Return: returns a string suitable for plugging into hecho, colored in the rainbow -- style chosen function rainbow(str, type, freq) -- default settings, set to default if out-of-bounds type = type or 0 if type > 2 or type < 0 then type = 0 end
freq = freq or 15
if freq < 0 or freq > 360 then freq = 15 end
local product = "" local phase = 2 * math.pi / 3
local rand = betterRand()
if type == 0 then -- Non-repeating rainbow freq = 2*math.pi / #str for i = 1, #str do if string.sub(str, i, i) == " " then product = product..string.sub(str, i, i) else r = math.sin(freq*i + phase + rand*10) * 127 + 128 g = math.sin(freq*i + 0 + rand*10) * 127 + 128 b = math.sin(freq*i + 2*phase + rand*10) * 127 + 128 r = string.format("%x", r) g = string.format("%x", g) b = string.format("%x", b)
if #r < 2 then r = "0"..r end if #g < 2 then g = "0"..g end if #b < 2 then b = "0"..b end product = product.."|c"..r..g..b..string.sub(str, i, i) end end elseif type == 1 then -- Repeating rainbow
freq = freq * math.pi / 180 for i = 1, #str do if string.sub(str, i, i) == " " then product = product..string.sub(str, i, i) else r = math.sin(freq*i + phase + rand*10) * 127 + 128 g = math.sin(freq*i + 0 + rand*10) * 127 + 128 b = math.sin(freq*i + 2*phase + rand*10) * 127 + 128 r = string.format("%x", r) g = string.format("%x", g) b = string.format("%x", b)
if #r < 2 then r = "0"..r end if #g < 2 then g = "0"..g end if #b < 2 then b = "0"..b end product = product.."|c"..r..g..b..string.sub(str, i, i) end end elseif type == 2 then -- Old, uglier rainbow local colours = { "|cFF0000", "|cFF6600", "|cFFEE00", "|c00FF00", "|c0099FF", "|c4400FF", "|c9900FF" } local pass = math.random(7)
for char in str:gmatch"." do if char == " " then product = product .. char else product = product .. colours[pass] .. char if pass == #colours then pass = 1 end pass = pass + 1 end end end return product.."|r" end
function betterRand() randomtable = {} for i = 1, 97 do randomtable[i] = math.random() end local x = math.random() local i = 1 + math.floor(97*x) x, randomtable[i] = randomtable[i], x return x end

Script.name: G R A D I E N T S
Script.script:
-- Take in a string to colorize and two hexidecimals in string format -- str : string to colorize -- l_color : string, hex format "RRGGBB", color for leftmost char -- r_color : string, hex format "RRGGBB", color for rightmost char -- type : int, gradient type, 0 is RGB (d), 1 is HSV, 2 is inverse HSV -- Return : a string such that hecho will display the original string -- colored so that it fades from the leftmost character being -- l_color to the rightmost character being r_color, producing as -- smooth a gradient as possible, in the type requested.
function colorGrad(str, l_color, r_color, type) type = type or 0 product = ""
-- extract RGB values l_r = tonumber(string.sub(l_color, 1, 2), 16) l_g = tonumber(string.sub(l_color, 3, 4), 16) l_b = tonumber(string.sub(l_color, 5, 6), 16)
r_r = tonumber(string.sub(r_color, 1, 2), 16) r_g = tonumber(string.sub(r_color, 3, 4), 16) r_b = tonumber(string.sub(r_color, 5, 6), 16)
if type == 0 then -- RGB Gradient
-- The rate of change of color from each character to the next m_r = (r_r - l_r) / (#str -1) m_g = (r_g - l_g) / (#str -1) m_b = (r_b - l_b) / (#str -1)
-- The starting color info b_r = l_r b_g = l_g b_b = l_b
-- Perform the gradient per character for i = 1, #str do f_r = string.format("%x", m_r * (i-1) + b_r) if #f_r < 2 then f_r = "0"..f_r end
f_g = string.format("%x", m_g * (i-1) + b_g) if #f_g < 2 then f_g = "0"..f_g end
f_b = string.format("%x", m_b * (i-1) + b_b) if #f_b < 2 then f_b = "0"..f_b end
product = product.."|c" product = product..f_r product = product..f_g product = product..f_b product = product..string.sub(str, i, i) end
else -- HSV Gradients, both normal and Inverse l_h, l_s, l_v = RGBtoHSV(l_r, l_g, l_b) r_h, r_s, r_v = RGBtoHSV(r_r, r_g, r_b)
-- Decide between standard (clockwise) or inverse (anti-clockwise) if type == 1 then -- standard -- We want to go clockwise along the color wheel, increasing l_h until we get to r_h h_delta = r_h - l_h if h_delta < 0 then h_delta = h_delta + 360 end h_delta = h_delta / (#str - 1)
s_delta = (r_s - l_s) / (#str - 1) v_delta = (r_v - l_v) / (#str - 1)
for i = 1, #str do n_r, n_g, n_b = HSVtoRGB(l_h + (h_delta * (i-1)), l_s + (s_delta * (i-1)), l_v + (v_delta * (i-1))) n_r = string.format("%x", n_r) n_g = string.format("%x", n_g) n_b = string.format("%x", n_b) if #n_r < 2 then n_r = "0"..n_r end if #n_g < 2 then n_g = "0"..n_g end if #n_b < 2 then n_b = "0"..n_b end
product = product.."|c" product = product..n_r product = product..n_g product = product..n_b product = product..string.sub(str, i, i) end elseif type == 2 then -- inverse h_delta = l_h - r_h if h_delta < 0 then h_delta = h_delta + 360 end h_delta = h_delta / (#str - 1)
s_delta = (l_s - r_s) / (#str - 1) v_delta = (l_v - r_v) / (#str - 1)
for i = 1, #str do n_r, n_g, n_b = HSVtoRGB(l_h - (h_delta * (i-1)), l_s - (s_delta * (i-1)), l_v - (v_delta * (i-1))) n_r = string.format("%x", n_r) n_g = string.format("%x", n_g) n_b = string.format("%x", n_b) if #n_r < 2 then n_r = "0"..n_r end if #n_g < 2 then n_g = "0"..n_g end if #n_b < 2 then n_b = "0"..n_b end
product = product.."|c" product = product..n_r product = product..n_g product = product..n_b product = product..string.sub(str, i, i) end end
end return product.."|r" end
function RGBtoHSV(r, g, b) r = r / 255 g = g / 255 b = b / 255
c_max = (r > g) and r or g
c_max = (c_max > b) and c_max or b
c_min = (r < g) and r or g c_min = (c_min < b) and c_min or b
delta = c_max - c_min
-- Calculate hue if delta == 0 then h = 0 elseif r == c_max then h = 60 * (((g - b) / delta) % 6) elseif g == c_max then h = 60 * (((b - r) / delta) + 2) else h = 60 * (((r - g) / delta) + 4) end if h < 0 then h = h + 360 end
-- Calculate Saturation if c_max == 0 then s = 0 else s = delta / c_max end
v = c_max
return h, s, v
end
function HSVtoRGB(h, s, v)
if h < 0 then h = h + 360 elseif h > 360 then h = h - 360 end
if h == 360 then h = 0 end
C = v * s
X = C * (1 - math.abs( (h/60) % 2 - 1 ))
m = v - C
if h < 60 then r, g, b = C, X, 0 elseif h < 120 then r, g, b = X, C, 0 elseif h < 180 then r, g, b = 0, C, X elseif h < 240 then r, g, b = 0, X, C elseif h < 300 then r, g, b = X, 0, C else r, g, b = C, 0, X end
R = math.floor((r + m) * 255 + 0.5) G = math.floor((g + m) * 255 + 0.5) B = math.floor((b + m) * 255 + 0.5)
return R, G, B
end

Script.name: Saving and Loading
Script.script:
function sndNDB_saveSettings(disp) if not sndNDB or not sndNDB.installed then return false end
local separator = string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" and "/" or "\\" local ndb_loc = getMudletHomeDir() .. separator .. "/Rime/SunderNDB"
table.save(ndb_loc, sndNDB)
if disp then rime.echo("Player information saved safely.") end end
function sndNDB_loadSettings() local separator = string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" and "/" or "\\" local ndb_loc = getMudletHomeDir() .. separator .. "/Rime/SunderNDB"
if not io.exists(ndb_loc) then rime.echo("Name database not found. Use 'sndb install' to fix this.") return end
sndNDB = {} table.load(ndb_loc, sndNDB) echo("Player information found and loaded in.")
sndNDB_saveSettings(false) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDisconnectionEvent", "sndNDB_saveSettings", true) registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", "sndNDB_loadSettings")

Script.name: Grab Information
Script.script:
function sndNDB_GetOnline() local path = getMudletHomeDir().."/sndndb"
if not lfs.attributes(path) then --We'll need a folder to store downloaded data. Don't worry, it won't cause issues. lfs.mkdir(path) rime.echo("Created folder to store downloaded data at: "..path) end
downloadFile(path .. "/Online.json", "http://api.aetolia.com/characters.json")
rime.echo("Let me find a list of online players really quick...")
ndbWatcher = ndbWatcher or createStopWatch() startStopWatch(ndbWatcher) end
function sndNDB_Acquire(person)
assert(person) local person = person:title() local path = getMudletHomeDir().."/sndndb"
if not lfs.attributes(path) then --We'll need a folder to store downloaded data. Don't worry, it won't cause issues. lfs.mkdir(path) rime.echo("Created folder to store downloaded data at: "..path) end
downloadFile(path .. "/"..person..".json", "http://api.aetolia.com/characters/"..person..".json")
end
function sndNDB_NameList(names) --Parse list to see who isn't tracked. for _, name in pairs(names) do if not table.contains(sndNDB.divine, name) then sndNDB_Acquire(name) end end rime.echo("Name database is now up to date.") end

Script.name: ndb_download_failed
Script.script:
function ndb_download_failed(_, filepath) if not filepath:find("sndndb") and not filepath:find("gamefeed") then return end
rime.echo("Error downloading information.") if filepath:find("gamefeed") then rime.echo("Unknown error while downloading: " .. filepath) os.remove(getMudletHomeDir().."/gamefeed.json") elseif filepath:match("server replied: Not Found") then
local person = filepath:match("/(%w+).json") local fpr = getMudletHomeDir().."/sndndb/"..person..".json"
rime.echo("This person does not exist: "..person) sndNDB_Remove(person) os.remove(fpr) else rime.echo("Unknown error while downloading: " .. filepath) end end

Script.name: ndb_download_success
Script.script:
function ndb_download_success(_, filepath) --Do not mess with if it's not Sunder NDB information. if not filepath:find("sndndb", 1, true) and not filepath:find("gamefeed",1,true) then return end
if filepath:find("Online",1,true) then sndNDB_SortOnline(filepath) return elseif filepath:find("gamefeed",1,true) then sndNDB_parseFeed(filepath) return end
local f, s = io.open(filepath) if f then s = f:read("*l"); io.close(f) end
-- didn't get JSON data? if s:find("Internal error", 1, true) or s:find("DOCTYPE html PUBLIC", 1, true) then cecho("\n<red>Data Acquisition Failed!") return end local t = yajl.to_value(s) local cities = {"Bloodloch", "Duiran", "Enorian", "Spinesreach"} local name = t.name local title = t.fullname local guild = t.guild:title() local xp_rank = t["xp rank"]:gsub("th", ""):gsub("nd", ""):gsub("st", ""):gsub("rd", "") if xp_rank == "Unranked" then xp_rank = 0 else local xp_rank = tonumber(xp_rank) end local city = t.city:title() local tether = "" if (city == "Duiran" or city == "Enorian") then tether = "Spirit" elseif (city == "Spinesreach" or city == "Bloodloch") then tether = "Shadow" end local class = t.class:title() local level = tonumber(t.level) local race = t.race
sndNDB.players[name] = { name = name, title = title, guild = guild, xp_rank = xp_rank, city = city, level = level, class = class, race = race, tether = tether }
if guild:find("none") then sndNDB.players[name].guild = "None" else sndNDB.players[name].guild = guild:title() end
if city:find("none") or city == "" then sndNDB.players[name].city = "None" else sndNDB.players[name].city = city:title() end
os.remove(filepath)
if honoursPerson ~= nil then send("honours "..honoursPerson,false) tempTimer(2, [[honoursPerson = nil]]) else raiseEvent("sndNDB Check Highlight", t.name) end end

Script.name: Ndb API
Script.script:
function sndNDB_getColour(name) if not sndNDB_Exists(name) then return "white" else return sndNDB.highlighting[sndNDB_getCitizenship(name)] end end function sndNDB_getClass(name) if sndNDB.players[name] then return sndNDB.players[name:title()].class else return "Unknown" end end function sndNDB_getGuild(name) if sndNDB.players[name] then return sndNDB.players[name:title()].guild else return "Unknown" end end
function sndNDB_Exists(name) if not sndNDB.players[name] then return false else return true end end
function sndNDB_isCitizenOf(city, name) if sndNDB_Exists(name) then return (sndNDB.players[name:title()].city == city:title() and true or false) else rime.echo("That person's information has not yet been gathered.") return false end end
function sndNDB_getCitizenship(name) if sndNDB_Exists(name) then if sndNDB.players[name].city:lower() == "none" or sndNDB.players[name].city:lower() == "(hidden)" then return "Rogues" else return sndNDB.players[name].city end else return "Unknown" end end
function sndNDB_Remove(name) local person = name:title() if sndNDB_Exists(person) then sndNDB.players[person] = nil --If any highlight available, then clear it. if sndNDB.highlightTriggers and sndNDB.highlightTriggers[person] then killTrigger(sndNDB.highlightTriggers[person]) end rime.echo(person.." has been removed from the database.") else rime.echo(person.." is not in the database, anyway.") end end
function sndNDB_SortOnline(filepath) local f, s = io.open(filepath) if f then s = f:read("*l"); io.close(f) end
-- didn't get JSON data? if s:find("Internal error", 1, true) or s:find("DOCTYPE html PUBLIC", 1, true) then cecho("\n<red>Data Acquisition Failed!") return end
local t = yajl.to_value(s)
apiOnlineFound = {} apiNeedUpdate = {} for ind, tab in pairs(t.characters) do if not tab.name:find("masked") and not table.contains(sndNDB.divine, tab.name) then table.insert(apiOnlineFound, tab.name) end end
for ind, tab in pairs(gmcp.Comm.Channel.Players) do if not table.contains(apiOnlineFound, tab.name) and not tab.name:find("masked") and not table.contains(sndNDB.divine, tab.name) then table.insert(apiOnlineFound, tab.name) end end
os.remove(filepath) table.sort(apiOnlineFound)
--Parse the list to see who needs to be added. local count = 0 for index, name in pairs(apiOnlineFound) do if not sndNDB_Exists(name) and not table.contains(sndNDB.divine, name) then count = count + 1 table.insert(apiNeedUpdate, name) end end
if count > 0 then rime.echo(count.." new names identified, grabbing their info.") cecho("\n<a_darkgrey> - "..table.concat(apiNeedUpdate, ", ")..".") sndNDB_NameList(apiNeedUpdate) else if parsingCity then if parsingCity:lower() == "classes" then sndNDB_displayOnlineClass(apiOnlineFound) else sndNDB_displayOnlineCity(apiOnlineFound) end else sndNDB_displayOnline(apiOnlineFound) end end end

Script.name: Ndb Highlighting
Script.script:
function sndNDB_Unhighlight() if not sndNDB.highlightTriggers or not next(sndNDB.highlightTriggers) then return end
local killTrigger = killTrigger for k,v in pairs(sndNDB.highlightTriggers) do killTrigger(v) end
sndNDB.highlightTriggers = {} end
function sndNDB_enemyHighlights() rime.echo("Clearing all highlights to prevent errors. One moment, please.") sndNDB_Unhighlight() tempTimer(2, [[ rime.echo("Loading new highlights now."); sndNDB_loadHighlights() ]]) end
local my_names_not_to_color = { "Example", }
function sndNDB_loadHighlights() sndNDB.highlightTriggers = sndNDB.highlightTriggers or {} collectgarbage("stop")
sndNDB_Unhighlight()
if sndNDB.highlightNames then for index, person in pairs(sndNDB.players) do sndNDB_highlightName( person.name, person.city ) end end
collectgarbage() end
function sndNDB_addHighlight(_, name)
if not sndNDB.highlightNames then return end if not name then return end if not sndNDB.players[name] then return end
sndNDB_highlightName( sndNDB.players[name].name, sndNDB.players[name].city) end
function sndNDB_updateHighlights(city, colour)
sndNDB.highlighting[city] = colour
local killTrigger = killTrigger for name, trig in pairs(sndNDB.highlightTriggers) do if sndNDB.players[name].city == city then killTrigger(trig) if sndNDB.highlightNames then sndNDB_highlightName( sndNDB.players[name].name, sndNDB.players[name].city ) end elseif city == "Rogues" or city == "(hidden)" then if sndNDB_getCitizenship(name) == "None" then killTrigger(trig) if sndNDB.highlightNames then sndNDB_highlightName( sndNDB.players[name].name, sndNDB.players[name].city ) end end end end
end
function sndNDB_highlightName(who, city) --If any highlight available, then clear it. if sndNDB.highlightTriggers and sndNDB.highlightTriggers[who] then killTrigger(sndNDB.highlightTriggers[who]) end
local colour = sndNDB.highlighting.Rogues
--Get the necessary colour. --Check enemy list first if sndNDB.highlightPriority == "enemies" then if table.contains(sndNDB.cityEnemies, who) then colour = sndNDB.highlighting.Enemies else if city == "None" or city == "(hidden)" then colour = sndNDB.highlighting.Rogues else colour = sndNDB.highlighting[city] end end else if city == "None" or city == "(hidden)" then colour = sndNDB.highlighting.Rogues else colour = sndNDB.highlighting[city] end end
sndNDB.highlightTriggers = sndNDB.highlightTriggers or {} if not table.contains(my_names_not_to_color, who) then sndNDB.highlightTriggers[who] = tempTrigger(who, ([[sndNDB_highlight("%s", %s)]]):format(who, (colour and '"' .. colour .. '"' or "false") )) end end
function sndNDB_highlight(name, colour) local c, k = 1, 1 while k > 0 do k = line:find(name, k) if k == nil then return end c = c + 1
if k == line:find("%f[%a]"..name.."%f[%A]", k) then if selectString(name, c-1) > -1 then if colour then fg(colour) end if sndNDB.highlightPriority == "enemies" and table.contains(sndNDB.cityEnemies, name) then if sndNDB.enemySettings.bold then setBold(true) end if sndNDB.enemySettings.underline then setUnderline(true) end if sndNDB.enemySettings.italics then setItalics(true) end end resetFormat() else return end end k = k + 1 end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("sndNDB Check Highlight", "sndNDB_addHighlight")

Script.name: Display API
Script.script:
function sndNDB_displayOnlineClass(players) local classList = { "Ascendril", "Luminary", "Sentinel", "Shaman", "Zealot", "Templar", "Monk", "Shapeshifter", "Syssin", "Wayfarer", "Archivist", "Carnifex", "Indorani", "Praenomen", "Sciomancer", "Teradrim", } local classes = { Ascendril = {}, Luminary = {}, Sentinel = {}, Shaman = {}, Zealot = {}, Templar = {}, Monk = {}, Shapeshifter = {}, Syssin = {}, Wayfarer = {}, Archivist = {}, Carnifex = {}, Indorani = {}, Praenomen = {}, Sciomancer = {}, Teradrim = {}, }
for _, player in pairs(players) do local class = sndNDB.players[player].class table.insert(classes[class], player) end
rime.echo("Data acqusition completed and analysed. Showing class count for online players.")
for _, class in ipairs(classList) do cecho("\n <DimGrey>[<NavajoWhite>"..class:title().."<DimGrey>]"..string.rep(" ", 13-string.len(class)).."- <NavajoWhite>"..#classes[class].." tracked people are "..class..".") end send(" ") parsingCity = nil end
function sndNDB_displayOnlineCity(players) local peopleFound = {}
rime.echo("Data acqusition completed and analysed. Showing online players from <"..sndNDB.highlighting[parsingCity:title()]..">"..parsingCity:title()..".")
for _, person in pairs(players) do if sndNDB_isCitizenOf(parsingCity:title(), person) then cecho("\n <"..sndNDB.highlighting[parsingCity:title()]..">"..person..string.rep(" ", 13-string.len(person)).."- <NavajoWhite>"..sndNDB_getClass(person)) end end send(" ") parsingCity = nil end
function sndNDB_displayOnline(players) local onlinePeople = { Bloodloch = {}, Duiran = {}, Enorian = {}, Spinesreach = {}, Rogues = {}, Untracked = {}, }
for _, person in pairs(players) do if not sndNDB_Exists(person) then table.insert(onlinePeople.Untracked, person) elseif sndNDB_getCitizenship(person):lower() == "none" or sndNDB_getCitizenship(person) == "(hidden)" or sndNDB_getCitizenship(person) == "Unknown" then table.insert(onlinePeople.Rogues, person) else table.insert(onlinePeople[sndNDB_getCitizenship(person)], person) end end
rime.echo("Data acquisition completed and analysed. List of players online:") echo("\n"..table.concat(apiOnlineFound, ", ")..".\nTotal players visible to us: "..#apiOnlineFound..".\n")
rime.echo(" City affiliations of currently online people:") cecho(string.format("\n<%s>[Bloodloch] :<white>(<orange>%d<white>)<%s> %s.", sndNDB.highlighting.Bloodloch, #onlinePeople.Bloodloch, sndNDB.highlighting.Bloodloch, table.concat(onlinePeople.Bloodloch, ", "))) cecho(string.format("\n<%s>[Duiran] :<white>(<orange>%d<white>)<%s> %s.", sndNDB.highlighting.Duiran, #onlinePeople.Duiran, sndNDB.highlighting.Duiran, table.concat(onlinePeople.Duiran, ", "))) cecho(string.format("\n<%s>[Enorian] :<white>(<orange>%d<white>)<%s> %s.", sndNDB.highlighting.Enorian, #onlinePeople.Enorian, sndNDB.highlighting.Enorian, table.concat(onlinePeople.Enorian, ", "))) cecho(string.format("\n<%s>[Spinesreach] :<white>(<orange>%d<white>)<%s> %s.", sndNDB.highlighting.Spinesreach, #onlinePeople.Spinesreach, sndNDB.highlighting.Spinesreach, table.concat(onlinePeople.Spinesreach, ", "))) cecho(string.format("\n<%s>[Rogues] :<white>(<orange>%d<white>)<%s> %s.", sndNDB.highlighting.Rogues, #onlinePeople.Rogues, sndNDB.highlighting.Rogues, table.concat(onlinePeople.Rogues, ", "))) echo("\n ") send(" ")
end

Script.name: Gamefeed Parser
Script.script:
function sndNDB_parseFeed(fp)
local f, s = io.open(fp) if f then s = f:read("*l"); io.close(f) end
-- didn't get JSON data? if s:find("Internal error", 1, true) or s:find("DOCTYPE html PUBLIC", 1, true) then cecho("\n<red>Data Acquisition Failed!") return end local t = yajl.to_value(s)
local colours = {LDN = "a_darkred", LUP = "a_darkgreen", DEA = "tomato", } local gcolour = false rime.echo("Aetolia Game Feed") for _, list in pairs(t) do if table.contains(colours, list.type) then gcolour = colours[list.type] else gcolour = "NavajoWhite" end cecho("\n<NavajoWhite>[<"..gcolour..">"..list.date.."<NavajoWhite>]:") cecho(string.rep(" ", 23-string.len(list.date)).."<"..gcolour..">"..string.trim(list.description)) end send(" ") os.remove(fp)
end

function fgcolor(color) setFgColor(color_table[color][1], color_table[color][2], color_table[color][3]) end
function bgcolor(color) setBgColor(color_table[color][1], color_table[color][2], color_table[color][3]) end
function cfgcolor(console, color) setFgColor(console, color_table[color][1], color_table[color][2], color_table[color][3]) end
function cbgcolor(console, color) setBgColor(console, color_table[color][1], color_table[color][2], color_table[color][3]) end
function showColours(num) cecho("\n<green> Showing a list of available colours, with "..num.." columns: \n") local lineBreak = num local linecount = 0 local padding = math.floor(90/num)
for col, tab in pairs(color_table) do linecount = linecount + 1 cecho(string.rep(" ", padding-#col).."<"..col..">"..col.."<NavajoWhite>,") if linecount >= lineBreak then echo("\n") linecount = 0 end end end

ScriptGroup.name: zGUI

Script.name: convertAdj.Init
Script.script:
-- convert Adjustable.Containers to UserWindows and back -- v0.1 -- Note: saving if UserWindow won't bring back as UserWindow if reloading -- by Edru 7th October 2020
convertAdj = convertAdj or {} function Adjustable.Container:onDoubleClick() self.isUserWindow = self.isUserWindow or false if not self.isUserWindow then self.userwindow = self.userwindow or Geyser.UserWindow:new({name = self.name.."userWindow"}) self.userwindow:show() self.userwindow:setTitle(self.name) self.userwindow:move(self:get_x(), self:get_y()) self.userwindow:resize(self:get_width(), self:get_height()) self:changeContainer(self.userwindow) self:move(0,0) self:resize("100%", "100%") self:lockContainer("standard") else registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysWindowMousePressEvent", "convertAdj.sendToPosition", true) convertAdj.container = self self.userwindow:hide_impl() end self.isUserWindow = self.isUserWindow == false and true or false end
function convertAdj.Init() Adjustable.Container:doAll(function(self) self.adjLabel:setDoubleClickCallback(function(event) self:onDoubleClick() end)end) local newWrapper = Adjustable.Container.new local saveWrapper = Adjustable.Container.save
function Adjustable.Container:new(cons, container) local me = newWrapper(self, cons, container) me.adjLabel:setDoubleClickCallback(function(event) me:onDoubleClick() end) return me end
function Adjustable.Container:save(slot, dir) if self.isUserWindow then local tempWindowName = self.windowname self.windowname = "main" self:setAbsolute(true, true) self:unlockContainer() saveWrapper(self, slot, dir) self:lockContainer() self.windowname = tempWindowName self:setPercent(true, true) else saveWrapper(self, slot, dir) end return true end
end
function convertAdj.sendToPosition(event, button, x, y, windowname) local self = convertAdj.container local newContainer = Geyser if windowname ~= "main" then newContainer = Geyser.windowList[windowname.."Container"].windowList[windowname] end self:resize(self:get_width(), self:get_height()) self:move(x, y) self:changeContainer(Geyser) self:setPercent(true, true) self:unlockContainer() self:show() convertAdj.container = nil end
